Evansville.Peter Augustus Maier House: Peter Augustus Maier House, also known as the Maier-Pollard House , is a historic home located at Evansville, Indiana. It was built in 1873, and is a 2 1/2-story, "L"-plan, Italianate style brick dwelling. It has a low-pitched slate cross-gable roof and features a bracketed cornice and paneled frieze.
